snippet: Rights groups say the Mexico Supreme Court’s ruling against Col. Jose Guadalupe Arias Agredana in the death of Jethro Sanchez could upend the way the nation deals with abuses by the military.
abstract: Mexico Supreme Court rules that Col Jose Guadalupe Arias Agredana should be tried in civilian courts in the death of Jethro Sanchez, a decision that rights group say could upend the way the nation deals with abuses by the military.
lead_paragraph: Rights groups say the Mexico Supreme Court’s ruling against Col. Jose Guadalupe Arias Agredana in the death of Jethro Sanchez could upend the way the nation deals with abuses by the military.

headline.seo: Mexico Army Colonel Must Stand Trial in Civilian Court
headline.main: Colonel in Cover-up Case to Be Tried in Mexico Civilian Court
headline.print_headline: Colonel in Cover-Up Case to Be Tried in Mexico Civilian Court

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
